content: **size** one size **measurements** height approx 32 cm / 12 5 ears included **materials** pica pau cotton 8/7 nude 2 skeins of color 18 1 skein of color 07 pica pau cotton 8/7 1 skein of color 08 1 skein of color 01 1 skein of color 23 1 skein of color 28 1 skein of color 37 crochet hook 2 75 mm / us c2 2 safety eyes 8 mm stuffing tapestry needle **yarn quality** pica pau cotton 8/7 nude hobbii 100% cotton 50 g 1 75 oz = 90 m 98 yds pica pau cotton 8/7 hobbii 100% cotton 50 g 1 75 oz = 90 m 98 yds **pattern information** irving donkey is an intermediate project worked in a continuous spiral to keep track of the rounds you may use a stitch marker or safety pin to mark the beginning of a round irving donkey also has 2 accessories an overall and a pair of boots remember that it s always advisable to give the entire pattern a read before starting crocheting and most importantly be patient with yourself **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6 spanish 7 italian 8 polish 9 dutch 10 1 https //hobbii de/irving-donkey
